choices.C: It will flood the frame out all ports.
choices.B: It will forward the frame out port Fa0/3 only.
choices.D: It will flood the frame out all ports except Fa0/3.

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit. SwitchA receives the frame with the addressing shown. According to the command output also shown in the exhibit, how will SwitchA handle this frame?
//IMG//

discussion.content: The answer should be ANOTHER choice which is "It will forward the frame out port Fa0/6 only".

choices.E: It will flood the frame out all ports except Fa0/3.
choices.B: It will forward the frame out port Fa0/6 only.
choices.D: It will flood the frame out all ports.
choices.C: It will forward the frame out port Fa0/3 only.

discussion.content: The answer should be E (It will flood the frame out all ports except Fa0/3).
